entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [IOS] : Having an issue of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps Pin Not able to display for the second opening item in the collection #28918
  • Binding Library - Adding .aar file which should resolve resolution issue but still class is not found. #28916
  • [Windows] GUI temporarily stops responding to mouse cursor, after repeatedly right-clicking to open the context menu (MAUI Blazor Hybrid) #28915
  • [iOS] ListView Cell with ContextActions may not show buttons sometimes #28912
  • [iOS] SetBlur() in canvas is not working #28910
  • Label text looks blurry/pixelated in specific iOS devices and simulators. #28907
  • [Android] .NET 9 Maui - Crash with CreateWindow method - SingleInstance #28906

Closed

  • [Windows] In the Blazor Web View, you can unintentionally drag and drop text into other windows #28917
  • iOS MAUI Build Error: The type 'UIKit.UIInputSuggestion' (used as a parameter in UIKit.UITextView.InsertInputSuggestion) is not available in iOS 18.2 #28913
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Windows]Shell flyout menu missing 😨 when full screen #18611
    Backlog
  • Mixed Content: The page at '<URL>}' was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure XMLHttpRequest endpoint '<URL>'. This request has been blocked; the content must be served over HTTPS. #28748

PullRequests

Created

  • Modernize MediaPicker iOS #28920
    area-essentials, essentials-mediapicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Fix PaddingWithoutSafeArea #28919
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixing #28912 by only hiding context buttons if user ever swiped left #28914
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed ScalingCanvas.SetBlur not working #28911
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [X] Protect some xmlns #28909
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Android - Dynamic Updates to CollectionView Header/Footer and Templates Are Not Displayed #28904
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.6 to 1.6.7 #28903
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml with latest public releases #28922
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28867 #28889
    p/0, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight, .NET 9 SR7
  • Update Versions.props to 9.0.70 SR7 #28900

Updated

  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix for the File.ContentType from MediaPicker not being in valid MIME format #28842
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, essentials-file-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Testing]Fix TappingDoneClosesKeyboard #28668
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
    area-infrastructure
  • [ai] Add release notes prompt #28896
  • Update Test HostApp to not use TableView #28830
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, area-controls-listview
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [XC] add IRootObjectProvider #28310
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed a NullReferenceException when starting application with empty shell on Windows #28879
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage #28844
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Cleanup of `AccessibilityExtensions` #27052
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-general, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed the span text disappeared in label when setting the font attribute on span and setting an implicit style for Label on content page #28851
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fix FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #28884
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was applied to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #28886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed the TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28890
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Start adding the ability to intercept all requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
